column3: @fedsten Is this change exhaustive throughout the documentation? `git grep` might help you find similar cases :-)

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #14119 (qa: Read reject reasons from debug log, not p2p messages by MarcoFalke)
* #14054 (p2p: Disable BIP 61 by default by MarcoFalke)
* #14045 (refactor: Fix the chainparamsbase -> util circular dependency by Empact)
* #13922 (Lower default relay fees by ajtowns)
* #13868 (Remo
Please squash these changes into single commit.
I updated the pull request and made sure the change is exhaustive throughout the documentation

I've looked through all the changes here, and they are basically just changing:
there's -> there is
they'll -> they will
they've -> they have
you're -> you are
you've -> you have
we'll -> we will
we're -> we are

across the entire repository. Given this isn't actually fixing anything, it has a large number of conflicts and it fails the linter because it's modifying subtrees, I'm
